variable.name: HRV_C_OR_F
variable.description: HRV COMPLEX OR FREQUENT VENTRICULAR PREMATURE BEATS

variable.name: HRV_EXAM
variable.description: FHS EXAM NUMBER

variable.name: HRV_HF_POWER
variable.description: HRV HIGH FREQUENCY POWER ELEMENTS (0.15-0.40 HZ) (HF)

variable.name: HRV_LF_POWER
variable.description: HRV LOW FEQUENCY POWER ELEMENTS (0.04-0.15 HZ) (LF) CALCULATED (LF=TF-HF-VLF)

variable.name: HRV_MF
variable.description: HRV MULTIFORM VENTRICULAR PREMATURE BEATS

variable.name: HRV_PAIRS
variable.description: HRV VENTRICULAR PREMATURE BEATS PAIRS

variable.name: HRV_PNN50
variable.description: HRV NN50 COUNT DIVIDED BY THE TOTAL NUMBER OF ALL R-R INTERVALS (PNN50)

variable.name: HRV_PROCMINS
variable.description: HRV TOTAL SPECTRAL TIME PROCESSED HOURS

variable.name: HRV_RMSSD
variable.description: HRV ROOT MEAN SQUARE OF SUCCESSIVE R-R INTERVAL DIFFERENCE (RMSSD)

variable.name: HRV_R_ON_T
variable.description: HRV R-ON-T VENTRICULAR PREMATURE BEATS

variable.name: HRV_SDNN
variable.description: HRV STANDARD DEVIATION OF ALL R-R INTERVALS (SDNN)

variable.name: HRV_STARTHRS
variable.description: HRV STARTING TIME NEAREST 0.25 HOUR

variable.name: HRV_SUMGOOD
variable.description: HRV NUMBER OF GOOD SPECTRAL BEATS

variable.name: HRV_SVPB
variable.description: HRV SUPRAVENTRICULAR PREMATURE BEATS

variable.name: HRV_S_MNSPHR
variable.description: HRV SPECTRAL MEAN HEART RATE (BEATS PER MINUTE)

variable.name: HRV_S_SPTIME
variable.description: HRV TOTAL SPECTRAL TIME PROCESSED (MINUTES)

variable.name: HRV_TOT_POWER
variable.description: HRV TOTAL POWER ELEMENTS (0.01-0.40 HZ) (TP)

variable.name: HRV_VLF_POWER
variable.description: HRV VERY LOW FREQUENCY POWER ELEMENTS (0.01-0.04 HZ) (VLF)

variable.name: HRV_VPBS_HR
variable.description: HRV VENTRICULAR PREMATURE BEATS PER HOUR

variable.name: HRV_VTBEATS
variable.description: HRV VENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA BEATS

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID
